verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of Asaph. <S%H623><s%> The mighty <S%H410><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> even the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> has spoken, <S%H1696><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> to the going <S%H3996><s%> down thereof.
Out of Zion, <S%H6726><s%> the perfection <S%H4359><s%> of beauty, <S%H3308><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has shined. <S%H3313><s%>

Our God <S%H430><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> and shall not keep silence: <S%H2790><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, and it shall be very <S%H3966><s%> tempestuous <S%H8175><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about him.
He shall call <S%H7121><s%> to the heavens <S%H8064><s%> from above, <S%H5921><s%> and to the earth, <S%H776><s%> that he may judge <S%H1777><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>
Gather <S%H622><s%> my saints <S%H2623><s%> together to me; those that have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with me by sacrifice. <S%H2077><s%>
And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall declare <S%H5046><s%> his righteousness: <S%H6664><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> is judge <S%H8199><s%> himself. <S%H1931><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will speak; <S%H1696><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and I will testify <S%H5749><s%> against you: I am God, <S%H430><s%> even your God. <S%H430><s%>
I will not reprove <S%H3198><s%> you for your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> or your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, to have been continually <S%H8548><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me.
I will take <S%H3947><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> bullock <S%H6499><s%> out of your house, <S%H1004><s%> nor he goats <S%H6260><s%> out of your folds. <S%H4356><s%>
For every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> is mine, and the cattle <S%H929><s%> on a thousand <S%H505><s%> hills. <S%H2042><s%>
I know <S%H3045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the mountains: <S%H2022><s%> and the wild <S%H2123><s%> beasts <S%H2123><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> are mine. <S%H5978><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> I were hungry, <S%H7456><s%> I would not tell <S%H559><s%> you: for the world <S%H8398><s%> is mine, and the fullness <S%H4393><s%> thereof.
Will I eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of bulls, <S%H47><s%> or drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of goats? <S%H6260><s%>
Offer <S%H2076><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> thanksgiving; <S%H8426><s%> and pay <S%H7999><s%> your vows <S%H5088><s%> to the most <S%H5945><s%> High: <S%H5945><s%>
And call <S%H7121><s%> on me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of trouble: <S%H6869><s%> I will deliver <S%H2502><s%> you, and you shall glorify <S%H3513><s%> me.

But to the wicked <S%H7563><s%> God <S%H430><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have you to do to declare <S%H5608><s%> my statutes, <S%H2706><s%> or that you should take <S%H5375><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> in your mouth? <S%H6310><s%>
Seeing you hate <S%H8130><s%> instruction, <S%H4148><s%> and casts <S%H7993><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> you.
When <S%H518><s%> you saw <S%H7200><s%> a thief, <S%H1590><s%> then you consented <S%H7521><s%> with him, and have been partaker <S%H2506><s%> with adulterers. <S%H5003><s%>
You give <S%H7971><s%> your mouth <S%H6310><s%> to evil, <S%H7451><s%> and your tongue <S%H3956><s%> frames <S%H6775><s%> deceit. <S%H4820><s%>
You sit <S%H3427><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> against your brother; <S%H251><s%> you slander <S%H5414><s%> <S%H1848><s%> your own mother's <S%H517><s%> son. <S%H1121><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> things have you done, <S%H6213><s%> and I kept <S%H2790><s%> silence; <S%H2790><s%> you thought <S%H1819><s%> that I was altogether such an one as yourself: but I will reprove <S%H3198><s%> you, and set them in order <S%H6186><s%> before your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

Now <S%H4994><s%> consider <S%H995><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> you that forget <S%H7911><s%> God, <S%H433><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> I tear <S%H2963><s%> you in pieces, and there be none <S%H369><s%> to deliver. <S%H5337><s%>

Whoever offers <S%H2076><s%> praise <S%H8426><s%> glorifies <S%H3513><s%> me: and to him that orders <S%H7760><s%> his conversation <S%H1870><s%> aright will I show <S%H7200><s%> the salvation <S%H3468><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>
